name: Spinnigolf
description:
A game inspired by Discord's Putt Party, Walkabout Mini Golf, and Gamepigeon's golf minigame. 

The goal of this game is to finish each hole with as little strokes as possible. Watch out for the quicksand, as it immediately resets you to your former position. Par for the course is 40. 

pro tip: power 1-5 is for getting the ball in the hole,  5-15 is for getting in the proximity, and I don't know what you're trying if you pick over 20 power.

Controls:

UP/DOWN arrowkeys or W/S to increase and decrease shot power. 

SPACE or LMB to launch/shoot.

All sounds are from Freesounds.org, but all art and code is by me. Made in 2:59 for Trijam #211, Theme Insane Accuracy. The link to the theme is that it takes quite a bit of accuracy to aim the ball correctly, as its direction is always changing.

Known issues:

- Screen text resizing issue

- bad font

- blurry font

- two balls appear momentarily when completing a level

Tell me your best score in the comments below!
